full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RAB GNAS RGYAS PA'I ZIN BRIS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @027A *, ,ZHES PA 'DI RGYAL BA'I GSUNG RAB MTHA' DAG LA MI 'JIGS PA'I SPOBS PA BRNYES NAS, RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE SGO SNA TSOGS NAS PHYOGS THAMS CAD DU RGYAS PAR MDZAD PA, CHOS KYI RJE RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I DPAL GYI ZHAL SNGA NAS GSUNG BGROS LTAR, 'BROG RI BO CHE DGA' LDAN RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I GLING DU BZHI 'DZIN PA GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GYIS YI GER BKOD PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS THAMS CAD DU RGYAS PAR BYED NUS PAR GYUR CIG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, , SVA STI, RGYAL BSTAN PAD TSAL PHAN BDE'I DRI BSUNG CAN, ,BSHAD SGRUB 'DAB RGYAS RNAM GROL SBRANG RTZI'I BCUD, ,'GRO KUN SPYOD PHYIR SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING, ,CHOS SDE CHE NAS CHOS SBYIN CHAR 'DI SPEL,, ,,
